title: Just some food for thought - Champ ability combinations
body:
Was just thinking about this the other day, what do you think would be the best combinations of any abilities in the game? Harder than you might expect, cuz they just probably all scale the same and you might want to balance utility, mobility, damage, etc.

Feel free to put ults in any combination. This might be op, who knows, but there are problems with having four 90 second cooldown abilities. I'm thinking some kind of blitzcrank Q with kass ulti would be pretty nice.

replies.body:
